attributes.action: Make it illegal for parents to charge their son/daughter dig money
attributes.additional_details: I want this to be taken further because I do not think it is fair if a mother or father is charging their sons/daughters money for living in their own home ESPECIALLY when they are in education learning. Fair enough if the sons/daughters is working but not when in education. It should be the parents job to continue to provide for their son/daughter!!!! Not the other way around.
attributes.background: make it illegal to make your son/daughter pay money for living at home while in education on a low or no income

rejection.details: We can't accept your petition because the UK Government and Parliament aren't responsible for the issue you raise. This is a decision for individuals.
